name: Subscribe Clickfunnel Landingpage leads to KlickTipp
description:
This automation connects ClickFunnels landing pages with KlickTipp to seamlessly transfer new lead data. When a visitor submits a form on the specified ClickFunnels page (e.g. “Product Coming Soon Page” or “XYZ”), their information — including first name, last name, email, phone number, household size, LinkedIn URL, and webinar date — is automatically sent to KlickTipp.

The scenario checks which landing page triggered the submission and routes the data accordingly. It then subscribes the contact with the according Tag and updates their custom fields in KlickTipp.

Ideal for marketers who want to automate lead management and ensure that all ClickFunnels leads are instantly captured and tagged within KlickTipp.
